c74object.name: mvc.GUI.IR.menu
c74object.digest: A GUI interface for an mvc.parameter of type Impulse Reponse buffer.
c74object.description: mvc.GUI.IR.menu is a wrapper around the more general mvc.remote objects. Use this to monitor a impulse response file parameter. It will automatically retrieve and display the list of impulse responses loaded by the mvc.device object from the "data/IR/" folder.

objarg.name: address
objarg.digest: The mvc.parameter or mvc.state's address to monitor.

objarglist.description: The address of a specific mvc.parameter or mvc.state can be given as an OSC formatted symbol. Multiple addresses can be set either as a list or using brace expansion notation or wildcards.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: Set the GUI element item width to fit your GUI.

method.name: address
method.digest: Sets the address of the mvc.parameter or mvc.state to monitor.
method.description:
address is a possible method on the right inlet.
The address of a specific mvc.parameter or mvc.state can be given as an OSC formatted symbol. Multiple addresses can be set either as a list or using brace expansion notation or wildcards.
